page.title: 04RAASAY TRANSPORT
page.content: THE ONLY WAY THAT YOU CAN GET TO THE ISLAND OF RAASAY IS BY THE FERRY.THIS MAKES GOODS A LITTLE MORE EXPENSIVE BUT YOU CAN GO TO AND FROM THE ISLAND IN YOUR OWN BOAT IF YOU HAVE ONE.THE RAASAY FERRY MAKES FIVE TRIPS A DAY.IT GOES TO SCONSER AND BACK AGAIN.THE FERRY CAN CARRY ABOUT SIX CARS AT A TIME.THERE ARE FOUR PEOPLE EMPLOYED ON THE FERRY.THERE ARE ALWAYS THREE EMPLOYEES ON THE FERRY AT ONE TIME AND ONE MAN IS THE RELIEF.IF THE FERRY IS NEEDED IN AN EMERGENCY ALISDAIR NICOLSON GETS A PHONE CALL AND THEN HE CONTACTS THE CREW AND THE FERRY IS READY TO LEAVE RAASAY IN ABOUT 15 MINUTES AFTER HE HAS RECEIVED THE PHONE CALL.STRONG SOUTH EASTERLY WINDS AFFECT THE FERRY THE MOST AND PREVENT IT FROM CROSSING BUT THIS HAPPENS VERY RARELY.
